this is long term work for u, so its good oppurtunity for u , as consistent income

item.title: Video and Audio Syncing (needs to be done by Friday!!) - Upwork
item.description:
I need this completed in days!!
We are seeking a skilled individual to sync iPhone video with audio from the Zoom platform. This task involves aligning the recorded video footage from an iPhone with the corresponding audio obtained from Zoom meetings. The goal is to ensure seamless synchronization between the video and audio to create a cohesive final product.

Required skills:
- Proficiency in video editing software
- Strong attention to detail
- Familiarity with iPhone video formats
- Experience with audio syncing techniques

If you have the expertise and precision to flawlessly synchronize video and audio, we would love to hear from you. This is a great opportunity to showcase your editing skills and contribute to a high-quality final output.

Size: Small
Duration: 2 days
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $125
Posted On: June 26, 2024 18:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer - Upwork
item.description:
I am starting a YouTube channel about healthy eating/ I need someone to help shoot a short video. These are the scenes of the video:
0. I introduce myself and my channel 1 minute
1. I am speaking to a client on phone 1 minutes
2. I make grocery list for her 1 minutes
3. I go shipping at Trader Joes and Wholefoods in Glendale 3 minutes each
4. I prepare some of her food in my kitchen 30 minutes
5. I arrive to her house in Atwater and get out of my car with the groceries/food 1 minute
6, I greet her at her door 1 minute
7. I walk into her kitchen and showed her what I got her 5 minutes

Total shooting time less than 45 minutes
Driving time from market to my kitchen to her kitchen around one hour
Then time to edit the video down to around 20 minutes

If this is successful. I might do similar videos weekly




Budget: $50
Posted On: June 26, 2024 18:26 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Event Photography, Videography, Video Editing
Skills: Event Photography, Videography, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor and Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor and content creator to join our team. Your main responsibility will be to edit and enhance videos for our social media platforms, specifically TikTok and YouTube Shorts. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating engaging and attention-grabbing content that appeals to a wide audience. As a video editor, you should be proficient in using video editing software and have a good understanding of current trends in video editing and social media. The ability to work efficiently and meet deadlines is crucial.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Content creation
- Knowledge of TikTok and YouTube Shorts
- Attention to detail
- Creativity

This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate level professional who can deliver high-quality videos that resonate with our target audience.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 18:30 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube SEO Researcher for Hip Hop Channel - Viral Content Strategy Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Hello sir, after taking a look at your profile I’m very impressed with your work. I am seeking an experienced YouTube SEO researcher to help boost my hip-hop channel's performance.

I feel this job is perfect for you as I'm looking for someone who not only understands YouTube SEO but also has a passion for hip-hop culture. Your previous experience working with hip-hop channels makes you an ideal candidate for this role. Your expertise will be crucial in helping my channel stand out in a competitive niche and attract more viewers with viral, trending content.


- Conduct thorough YouTube SEO research to identify trending topics in the hip-hop community

-Generate viral video ideas and catchy titles that align with current hip-hop trends and audience interests

-Analyze competitors' content strategies and identify gaps in the market

-Provide keyword recommendations to improve video discoverability

-Offer insights on optimal posting times and content scheduling

My Goals include:
-Having continuously viral videos in order for me to have consistent Adsense income
- reaching 100k subs by end of the year
- helping me find other ways to monetize my channel

I hope you can help me achieve my YouTube goals and we can potentially have a long term partnership. It’s vital for me to have someone on my team who has a strong understanding of YouTube's algorithm and ranking factors, Familiarity with SEO tools such as TubeBuddy, vidIQ, or similar, Up-to-date knowledge of hip-hop trends, artists, and culture and of course excellent analytical and research skills

Ideally I would like a weekly report of 5-10 viral topic ideas with SEO-optimized titles
Monthly competitor analysis and trend report
And Ongoing keyword recommendations for video descriptions and tags

Please let me know if your interested
Let's collaborate to take my hip-hop channel to the next level! Once i agreed I can share with you my YouTube channel which has already amassed over 500,000 views in the last 6months.


Posted On: June 26, 2024 18:25 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube, Video Editing, YouTube Monetization, YouTube Subscribers, YouTube Video, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Imagery, Video Editing & Production, YouTube Development, YouTube SEO, 360-Degree Video Editing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Management, Social Media Account Setup, Social Media Advertising
Skills: YouTube, Video Editing, YouTube Monetization, YouTube Subscribers, YouTube Video, YouTube Marketing, Social Media Imagery, Video Editing & Production, YouTube Development, YouTube SEO, 360-Degree Video Editing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Management, Social Media Account Setup, Social Media Advertising
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Personal Branding Expert Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a personal branding expert, who can help me create a clear brand strategy / branding for my business

A clear creative direction
Fonts of my brand
The Colors of my brand
Getting clear on my brand message
Brand Logo

I need a big file with a clear brand strategy file
For whenever I hire employees I can send them one file they can use as reference for their work

If this work has been good and I see value in us working together to bring my content ideas to life in a long term project. You can be hired for longer if you're also a good video editor and graphic designer.

Examples of inspiration brands:
https://www.instagram.com/natasha.zoryk/
https://www.instagram.com/inspiredmediaco/

My Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/jenniferhardeman/

Thank you! 🤍

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 18:25 UTC
Category: Creative Direction
Skills:Creative Brief, Brand Strategy, Creative Strategy, Brand Design, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Content Strategy, Social Media Content, Social Media Strategy
Skills: Creative Brief, Brand Strategy, Creative Strategy, Brand Design, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Content Strategy, Social Media Content, Social Media Strategy

item.title: Weekly Church Service Recording and YouTube Upload Specialist Needed ( Memphis, TN) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a dedicated and skilled videographer to record our Sunday church services in Memphis, TN, and upload the footage to our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate will have experience in live event recording and video editing, ensuring high-quality content is delivered consistently.

Responsibilities:
Record Sunday church services every week.
Edit the recorded footage for clarity and professionalism.
Upload the edited video to our YouTube channel promptly after each service.
Requirements:

Experience in videography and video editing.
Own recording equipment (camera, tripod, microphones).
Reliable transportation to and from the church location in Memphis, TN.
Ability to deliver videos in a timely manner.

Please provide samples of previous work, specifically any live event recordings.
Include a brief description of your experience and why you are the ideal candidate for this role.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 18:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, YouTube Marketing, Video Editing, Communications
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, YouTube Marketing, Video Editing, Communications
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: USA
click to apply
